channel.title: Paintball or Airsoft
channel.description:
Hi, am going out to a friends party in an hour to a paintballing place.
I would like your views on which is better, and please [b]Do Not[/b] vote if you haven't played both of them, if you have only played one please post instead of voting.
I personally find airsoft way more fun.

item.title: Paintball or Airsoft
item.dc:creator: @LegendScape LegendScape
item.description:
@LegendScape wrote:

i play serious hardcore. Last airsoft war i was in damn metel pellets, gas powered weapons point blank midnight. god the rush!

Read full topic

item.title: Paintball or Airsoft
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

Airsoft looks amazing and very realistic. Paintball is amazingly fun when you get into it. I went to GCTAs paintball thingy and he had a smoke grenade … and set it off in our own base so all the other people were like “Wtf who was that?” I laughed loads. I want to play Airsoft with a FAMAS… omfg I love those guns!

Read full topic

item.title: Paintball or Airsoft
item.dc:creator: @LegendScape LegendScape
item.description:
@LegendScape wrote:

both what is life without the other

Read full topic

item.title: Paintball or Airsoft
item.dc:creator: @kmb Kmb
item.description:
@kmb wrote:

I prefer paintball for some reason. As someone said, airsoft “bullet” is like a mosquito bite, whereas paintball really hurts if hit the right spot. Definitely keeps you motivated.

Oh and I’ve never played anywhere but in forest.

Read full topic

item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

I definatly prefer urban. will post some pics of the place i went to in a minute if i can.

item.title: Paintball or Airsoft
item.dc:creator: @Cunit Cunit
item.description:
@Cunit wrote:

Ummm urban is airbunkers and all that usually have to games
speed ball- As many games as you can play in 20 min whoever gets most points wins
X-Ball- [caputer the flag] and just normal game trying to shoot people out (if your good with team tactics)
i like to play xball (urban)

then forests of cource is called Wood’s ball wich basicly do whatever im not a big fan of it

and yes it gets very serious

Read full topic

item.title: Paintball or Airsoft
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Cunit:

oh yea…you can make money off it big money to… One Paintball team Dynasty player (Oliver Lang) 18 years old drafted to Iorn Men For $100,000 Garenteed money signing bonus

Wow thats a damn lot of money just to play paintballs… i didn’t realise it got so serious.

So what do you guys prefer? Urban or foresty/jungle place?

Read full topic

item.title: Paintball or Airsoft
item.dc:creator: @Cunit Cunit
item.description:
@Cunit wrote:

no our name isnt sponsored paintball team lol… its impending disaster here’s an article from along time ago on our team

First place Rookie, which included a set of Smart Parts Ions was grabbed by Impending Disaster. Second place went to Mayhem, third to Stalkers and Fourth to the Sentinels. For the novices, the first place team went home with a set of five DYE DM-6s as a part of their prize package. These went to RNT out of South Florida, who fielded Max Dev Cyborgs through the event. Second place went to First Down Blue, with Who Too in third and SAS Mayhem in fourth.

Despite not making their way into the final four, Crusaders earned enough points to maintain their rookie lead in the series rankings. Whoo Too did the same, with a stronger finish in Palm Bay giving them an even stronger lead in the series.

From Palm Bay, the Florida State Sunshine Series heads back to Osceola Extreme Sports May before a return to Palm Bay in late July.

Editor’s Note – It has been quite gratifying to see our home field of Hurricane Paintball Park grow from an idea at the Palm Bay Parks and Recreation department into first a well laid out scenario field, and now an operating tournament site drawing teams from other parts of the state.

Osceola extreme sports is OES

we are d3 now that was our 3rd tornement i belive

Read full topic

item.title: Paintball or Airsoft
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Sponsored paintball team…? Never heard of it tbh. I’ve only ever did paintball for fun, didn’t know you could make money off of it.

Read full topic

item.title: Paintball or Airsoft
item.dc:creator: @Cunit Cunit
item.description:
@Cunit wrote:

well i buy good paintballs that will break VERY easily and have watery like paint so its easyer to shot your oponint out without them whiping or Bounces

item.title: Paintball or Airsoft
item.dc:creator: @dragonus18 dragonus18
item.description:
@dragonus18 wrote:

[quote=“Cunit, post:23, topic:131415”][quote author=davidude36 link=topic=182113.msg1703793#msg1703793 date=1188138756]

ive played paintball for 5 years and i have to say Paintball

however if you want more tactical and longerlasting games (cheaper etc) than you have to pick airsoft

for me this is usualy my costs when i go paintballing not with my team

  1. Case of paint (2000 paintballs)- $50.00
    With Team: case of paint (2000 paintballs)- Free

  2. Nitros (not c02 because i dont use gay walmart guns)- Full Day Without team: $10.00
    With team: $1.00

  3. All Day Wrist Banned Without team: $5.50
    With Team: free

total cost without being with my sponsered team: $65.50
Total cost with sponsored team (full): $1.00

that is if i go to OES where im sponsored

sounds good, the place where i went they were trying to make us buy 2000 paintballs for about $380. I only bought 300 because i knew it was a rip off but i couldnt get any cheaper.
[/quote]

Wow… yea thats a big rip off[/quote]

yeah i can buy 500 paintballs fomr the store for like idk 5$

Read full topic

item.title: Paintball or Airsoft
item.dc:creator: @pko pko
item.description:
@pko wrote:

[quote=“o_town_reaper, post:14, topic:131415”][quote author=darkruler link=topic=182113.msg1673544#msg1673544 date=1187088181]

I’d have to say paint ball… I play it all the time with my friends. I only play air soft with my 10 year old brother… paint ball is more of a “mans” sport. I get more joy causing pain to my closest of friends anyway. Air soft is like “C’mon guys! Lets go run around and shoot each other with soft lil plastic balls!!! Yippie!”… You could just stand there right next to each other and hold down the trigger at each other… with no reason to duck and cover… because you dont have any real reason to… on the other hand, paint ball… if you dont duck and cover, your going to catch one in the nuts and wont be able to have kids. Paint ball is the shit i say.

airsoft guns can hurt just as bad as painball guns.

Paint balls sorta leave welts the size of grapes… Air soft are like like mosquito bites.
[/quote]

Then you haven’t played with strong enough guns because I’ve played before with very high powered guns and they have broken skin.[/quote]

why the fuck are we arguing about what hurts moar fucknuts?

okay, I would say paintball because… I play almost every weekend and I only play airsoft when I can find the time.

I have a tippmann M5, its a decent first gun, and I like it.

Read full topic

item.title: Paintball or Airsoft
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

RXVL:

This is a good debate. I like airsoft because its inexpensive and you can play it in a lot of places. I have tons of different guns for it. I like paintball because theres more action and you get a bigger adrenaline rush. The downside to paintball is its really fucking expensive, its $25 for 2000 paintballs, versus $2.50 for 2000 airsoft rounds. I have a Spyer Electra with Eyes and I love it, but I cant seem the time to play.

Nice, you have the same gun as me. I also have a proto jersey and mask, lol. Around here it’s 40 dollars for 800 balls =/

Haven’t played a game for a long time, but we used to go inside a wood mill to play, it was sweet.

[quote=“o_town_reaper, post:14, topic:131415”][quote author=darkruler link=topic=182113.msg1673544#msg1673544 date=1187088181]

I’d have to say paint ball… I play it all the time with my friends. I only play air soft with my 10 year old brother… paint ball is more of a “mans” sport. I get more joy causing pain to my closest of friends anyway. Air soft is like “C’mon guys! Lets go run around and shoot each other with soft lil plastic balls!!! Yippie!”… You could just stand there right next to each other and hold down the trigger at each other… with no reason to duck and cover… because you dont have any real reason to… on the other hand, paint ball… if you dont duck and cover, your going to catch one in the nuts and wont be able to have kids. Paint ball is the shit i say.

airsoft guns can hurt just as bad as painball guns.

Paint balls sorta leave welts the size of grapes… Air soft are like like mosquito bites.
[/quote]

Then you haven’t played with strong enough guns because I’ve played before with very high powered guns and they have broken skin.[/quote]

My friend shot me with an airsoft sniper rifle gun. I had to dig around my skin to pull it out. Usually when I’ve been shot with them, it might break the skin but bounces back out =/

Read full topic

place where i went was £10 (about $19) to get in and £125 (about $240) for 2500 paintballs
